name: flappy Bird (itch) (DinosGamesStudio)
description:
easy to play, hard to master! this is the popular flappy bird game built for pc!

controls:

press R to restart the game at any time.

hold space to rise up and let go to let yourself fall down.

hold D to dive bomb and rise faster.

the game will keep your high score, but the high score will reset when you close the game.
